comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Perhaps the John B. Foster who was secretary to the New York Giants from 1912 to 1919. See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E05EED9123BEE32A... (NYT article of Dec 15, 1919). There is a captioned photo in www.la84foundation.org/SportsLibrary/BBM/1914/bbm4d.pdf of National League club owners that shows Foster (as well as Harry Hampstead, the President of the Giants). I could believe it is the same person. If so, he was previously editor of Spalding's Official Baseball Guide. There are pictures at memory.loc.gov/cgi-bin/ampage?collId=spalding&fileNam... and memory.loc.gov/cgi-bin/ampage?collId=spalding&fileNam... I'm pretty certain the last one is of the man pictured here.
